Row.Text: The Shipyard provides +15% production of naval units in this city.
Shipyards are places where ships are repaired and built. These can be yachts, military vessels, cruise liners or other cargo or passenger ships.
The Shipyard provides +15% production of naval units and requires a seaport.
The Officer Academy provides 15xp to all Naval Units. It also provides a free Great Admiral in this City.
The Officer Academy provides the best training a Naval Officer could hope for. Some of history's greatest Admirals were products of these Academies.
Gives 15xp to all Naval units and gives a free Great Admiral. Great for giving your fleets the edge you need.
